title: Please Help!!!! Account hacked
body: So i was playing a game when my i suddenly logged out somehow and the screen said something that the account is being shared or something then i tried to log back in and couldn't so I'm on the computer and i check account setting nd my email has been changed and so did my password plz help

replies.body: Changing your password was a great action to take, and I also recommend using our account [protection guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)to secure your info in and outside of league.  If you need any additional help, we can help you directly as well through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  We got your back!
